standard_clauses.red_flag_if: security deposit exceeds 2 months rent for residential
standard_clauses.plain_english: Your landlord cannot ask for more than 2 months rent as security deposit for residential premises.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: मकान मालिक आवासीय परिसर के लिए 2 महीने के किराए से अधिक जमानत राशि नहीं मांग सकता।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Security Deposit shall not exceed two (2) months' rent as mandated by Section 11 of the Model Tenancy Act, 2021.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no mention of registration of tenancy agreement
standard_clauses.plain_english: Every tenancy agreement must be registered with the Rent Authority.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: प्रत्येक किरायेदारी समझौते को किराया प्राधिकरण के साथ पंजीकृत करना अनिवार्य है।
standard_clauses.template_clause: This Agreement shall be registered with the Rent Authority within two months of execution.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: notice period less than 1 month or no notice clause
standard_clauses.plain_english: Either party must give at least 1 month written notice before termination.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: किसी भी पार्टी को समाप्ति से पहले कम से कम 1 महीने की लिखित सूचना देनी होगी।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Either party may terminate this Agreement by giving not less than one (1) month's written notice.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: rent increase exceeds 10% annually or no cap on increase
standard_clauses.plain_english: Rent revision terms must be specified and should not be unreasonable.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: किराया संशोधन की शर्तें निर्दिष्ट होनी चाहिए और अनुचित नहीं होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Rent shall be revised as mutually agreed, with an annual increase not exceeding 10%.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: all maintenance pushed to tenant including structural repairs
standard_clauses.plain_english: Structural repairs are the landlord's responsibility. Minor repairs are the tenant's.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: संरचनात्मक मरम्मत मकान मालिक की जिम्मेदारी है। मामूली मरम्मत किरायेदार की है।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Landlord shall be responsible for structural repairs. The Tenant shall maintain the premises and bear costs of minor repairs.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no refund timeline or timeline exceeds 1 month after vacating
standard_clauses.plain_english: Security deposit must be refunded within 1 month of vacating the premises.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: परिसर खाली करने के 1 महीने के भीतर जमानत राशि वापस करनी होगी।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Security Deposit shall be refunded within one (1) month of the Tenant vacating the premises, after deducting legitimate costs.

standard_clauses.plain_english: Subletting is not allowed without written consent of the landlord.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: मकान मालिक की लिखित सहमति के बिना उपकिराया देना अनुमत नहीं है।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Tenant shall not sublet the premises without prior written consent of the Landlord.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: landlord can cut essential services like water and electricity
standard_clauses.plain_english: Landlord cannot cut off essential services like water, electricity to force eviction.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: मकान मालिक बेदखली के लिए पानी, बिजली जैसी आवश्यक सेवाएं बंद नहीं कर सकता।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Landlord shall not withhold or cut off essential services including water and electricity supply.
